Text: Update to privacy policyCustomer We have just updated Amazoncoms privacy policy and because privacy is important we wanted to email you proactively in this case and not just update the policy on our site as is the common Web practice Thanks for being a customer and allowing us to continue to earn your trust To read the updated Privacy Notice visit privacynotice Thanks again for shopping at Amazoncom Sincerely Amazoncom PS We hope you appreciated receiving this message However if youd rather not receive any future notices of this sort from Amazoncom please send an email message to Please be aware that even if you choose not to receive these updates they will still cover your use of Amazoncom Please note that this message was sent to the following email address
